name: A Fight In Time
description:
November 27, 2035. Dr.Long has activated his time machine. Your duty is to stop the time machine before the dimension shatters.

A Fight in Time is a fast paced 2D shooter in which you must use your rewinding powers to save your dimension. 

The game was made during Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 and it is my first game jam so dont expect anything fancy
